hero.title: Farm-to-Home Marketplace
hero.subtitle: Fresh, local produce delivered directly from farms to your table. Support local farmers while enjoying the freshest seasonal foods.

items.title: Eco-Conscious Families
items.description: Families wanting fresh, chemical-free produce for healthy meals.

items.title: Urban Professionals
items.description: Busy individuals seeking convenient access to quality local food.

items.title: Small Restaurants
items.description: Local eateries wanting to source fresh ingredients directly.

items.title: Community Groups
items.description: Organizations looking to support local agriculture.

items.title: Fresh Produce
items.description: Farm-fresh fruits, vegetables, and artisan products

items.title: Local Connection
items.description: Direct relationship with farmers in your region

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Reduced carbon footprint through local sourcing

items.title: Fair Prices
items.description: Better prices for you and fair pay for farmers

steps.title: Browse Local Farms
steps.description: Discover farmers and producers near you

steps.title: Enjoy Fresh Food
steps.description: Receive quality produce at your doorstep

items.question: How fresh are the products?
items.answer: Products are harvested within 24-48 hours of delivery, ensuring maximum freshness.

items.question: Can I visit the farms?
items.answer: Yes! Many of our partner farms offer visits and tours for customers.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

cta.title: Start Eating Fresh Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of families enjoying farm-fresh produce.

hero.title: Urban Gardening Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Transform your balcony or small space into a thriving garden with our starter kits, guides, and community support.

items.title: Apartment Dwellers
items.description: City residents wanting to grow food on balconies or windowsills.

items.title: Beginners
items.description: First-time gardeners looking for easy-to-follow guidance.

items.title: Families with Kids
items.description: Parents teaching children about nature and food production.

items.title: Sustainability Advocates
items.description: Eco-conscious individuals reducing their food miles.

items.question: How much space do I need?
items.answer: You can start with just a windowsill! Our micro-garden kits are designed for spaces as small as 2 square feet.

items.question: What can I grow in an apartment?
items.answer: Herbs, leafy greens, tomatoes, peppers, and even strawberries thrive in urban settings with proper care.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
items.answer: Yes! Our community forum and expert gardeners are available to help you succeed.

cta.title: Start Your Garden Today
cta.subtitle: Everything you need to grow fresh food at home.

hero.title: Barter & Exchange Platform
hero.subtitle: Trade goods, skills, and services with your community. Reduce waste and build connections without cash.

items.title: Community Members
items.description: Anyone wanting to trade goods and services locally.

items.title: Skilled Craftspeople
items.description: Artisans looking to exchange their creations for other goods.

items.title: Budget-Conscious
items.description: People wanting to access goods without spending cash.

items.title: Sustainability Minded
items.description: Those wanting to reduce consumption and waste.

items.question: How does the exchange work?
items.answer: List what you have to offer, browse what others are offering, and propose trades directly through our platform.

items.question: Is there a fee to join?
items.answer: Basic membership is free! Premium features are available for active traders.

items.question: How do I ensure fair trades?
items.answer: Our community rating system and suggested value guides help ensure fair exchanges.

cta.title: Start Trading Today
cta.subtitle: Join a community of exchangers in your area.

hero.title: Student & Youth Freelancing
hero.subtitle: Empowering young people to develop skills, build portfolios, and earn while learning through local and global opportunities.

items.title: Students
items.description: School and university students wanting to earn while studying.

items.title: Young Creatives
items.description: Aspiring designers, writers, and artists building portfolios.

items.title: Tech-Savvy Teens
items.description: Young people with digital skills to offer.

items.title: Career Starters
items.description: Recent graduates gaining real-world experience.

items.question: What age can I join?
items.answer: Young people aged 14+ can join with parental consent. Full access is available at 16+.

items.question: What skills are in demand?
items.answer: Tutoring, design, content creation, tech support, and local services are popular categories.

items.question: How do payments work?
items.answer: Secure payments through our platform with options for bank transfer or parent-managed accounts.

cta.title: Launch Your Freelance Journey
cta.subtitle: Build skills and earn while you learn.

hero.title: Local-to-Global Commerce
hero.subtitle: Scale your sustainable business from local markets to global reach with our network and expertise.

items.title: Small Producers
items.description: Local businesses ready to expand their reach.

items.title: Sustainable Brands
items.description: Eco-friendly companies seeking growth opportunities.

items.title: Investors
items.description: Impact investors looking for sustainable ventures.

items.title: Cooperatives
items.description: Producer groups wanting to scale collectively.

items.question: What support do you provide?
items.answer: Business consulting, market analysis, partnership facilitation, and funding connections.

items.question: Is this only for large businesses?
items.answer: No! We specialize in helping small sustainable businesses scale thoughtfully.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: Timelines vary based on goals. Initial consultations help establish realistic expectations.

cta.title: Scale Your Impact
cta.subtitle: Take your sustainable business to the next level.
